intro: Biophytum reinwardtii var. reinwardtii, commonly known as the silverleaf plant, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, silver-green leaves and produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange. It thrives in arid and semi-arid conditions, making it a popular choice for xeriscaping. The plant's unique appearance and low maintenance requirements make it a desirable ornamental plant.
